newsitem.title: USA: Host Marriott raises $550 mln in offering.
newsitem.headline: Host Marriott raises $550 mln in offering.

text.p: Host Marriott Corp said Wednesday it has completed the sale of $550 million of 6.75 percent convertible preferred securities.
Each of the preferred trust securities is convertible into about 2.7 shares of Host Marriott common stock at a conversion premium of 23 percent, or about $18.60 per share, Host Marriott said.
The company said proceeds will be used to continue acquiring hotels, to make investments in compatible real estate assets, to repay certain indebtedness and to fund other corporate purposes.

The company said it has acquired assets valued at more than $1.3 billion this year, which is more than three times the amount acquired in 1995. "The proceeds of this offering will enable us to continue to finance our strong pipeline of potential acquisitions at attractive prices," the company said in a release.
